ygData.subject: [eqbards] Back to good stuff, LOOT! and Levels!
ygData.msgSnippet: Can I request a kabong of the fear topic? (I gotta learn to keep my mouth shut) A few questions. I am about to break out of 40 (like 3/4 bub left, it should
ygData.messageBody:
Can I request a kabong of the fear topic? (I gotta learn to keep my mouth
shut)
A few questions.

I am about to break out of 40 (like 3/4 bub left, it should fall tonight no
problem)

Which means I will learn Max's Beserker Cresendo soon. When i am the haster
(IE no enchanter in group) I use Celerity now (which i LOVE, the agi buff
gives a nice ac boost). Do the experienced (I aask since its high level
song) bards think Besrker is better? (it gives str boost I think the haste
effect is the same)
(This is excluding the obvious benefit of guildmates saying "Olaf, do
Beserker.")

Loot: I need to upgrade my belt, back and shoulders. What do you all
reccomend out there? I like maxing my AC, Resists, CHA, and STR (in that
order). Right now I have a Kunzar Mantle (idiot me looted it not knowing it
was no drop) (ac7, wis,dex,agi +3), a splinted bronze cloak (UGH!) and a
straw spun belt (ac 10, but weighs 6...). I have about 2k right now and
dont really have trouble making money, though I would rather go get a guild
run to get new items... Any suggestions?

Elfson Allegro
Bard of Norrath since December. Well not including March and April.
